mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WMO_MD_METADATA A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.METADATASEQN IN ( SELECT B.METADATASEQN FROM WMO_MD_KEYWORDS A, WMO_MD_DATAIDENTIFICATION B WHERE A.KEYWORD LIKE '%' || #{search_text} || '%' AND B.DATAIDENTIFICATIONSEQN = A.DATAIDENTIFICATIONSEQN )

SELECT METADATASEQN ,FILEIDENTIFIER ,LANGUAGE ,CHARACTERSET ,HIERARCHYLEVEL ,HIERARCHYLEVELNAME ,DATESTAMP ,METADATASTANDARDNAME ,METADATASTANDARDVERSION ,LOCALE FROM WMO_MD_METADATA A WHERE A.METADATASEQN= #{metadataseqn}
SELECT EXTENSIONINFORMATIONSEQN ,METADATASEQN ,EXTENSIONONLINERESOURCE FROM WMO_MD_EXTENSIONINFORMATION A WHERE A.METADATASEQN= #{metadataseqn}
SELECT CONTACTSEQN ,RESPONSIBLEPARTYSEQN ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,ONLINERESOURCE FROM WMO_CI_CONTACT A WHERE A.RESPONSIBLEPARTYSEQN= #{responsiblepartyseqn}
SELECT TELEPHONESEQN ,CONTACTSEQN ,VOICE FROM WMO_CI_TELEPHONE A WHERE A.CONTACTSEQN= #{contactseqn}
SELECT ADDRESSSEQN ,CONTACTSEQN ,DELIVERYPOINT ,CITY ,ADMINISTRATIVEAREA ,POSTALCODE ,COUNTRY ,ELECTRONICMAILADDRESS FROM WMO_CI_ADDRESS A WHERE A.CONTACTSEQN= #{contactseqn}

SELECT DATAIDENTIFICATIONSEQN ,METADATASEQN ,CITATION ,ABSTRACT ,POINTOFCONTACT ,SPATIALREPRESENTATIONTYPE ,SPATIALRESOLUTION ,LANGUAGE ,TOPICCATEGORY ,RESOURCEMAINTENANCE ,DESCRIPTIVEKEYWORDS ,EXTENT ,RESOURCECONSTRAINTS FROM WMO_MD_DATAIDENTIFICATION A WHERE A.METADATASEQN= #{metadataseqn}
SELECT DATESEQN ,CITATIONSEQN ,DATES ,DATETYPE FROM WMO_CI_DATE WHERE CITATIONSEQN = #{citationseqn}
SELECT KEYWORDSSEQN ,DATAIDENTIFICATIONSEQN ,KEYWORD ,TYPE ,THESAURUSNAME FROM WMO_MD_KEYWORDS A WHERE A.DATAIDENTIFICATIONSEQN= #{dataidentificationseqn}
SELECT EXTENTSEQN ,DATAIDENTIFICATIONSEQN ,GEOGRAPHICELEMENT ,TEMPORALELEMENT FROM WMO_EX_EXTENT A WHERE A.DATAIDENTIFICATIONSEQN= #{dataidentificationseqn}
SELECT TEMPORALEXTENTSEQN ,EXTENTSEQN ,EXTENT FROM WMO_EX_TEMPORALEXTENT A WHERE A.EXTENTSEQN= #{extentseqn}
SELECT DISTRIBUTIONSEQN ,METADATASEQN ,DISTRIBUTIONFORMAT ,DISTRIBUTOR ,TRANSFEROPTIONS FROM WMO_MD_DISTRIBUTION A WHERE A.METADATASEQN= #{metadataseqn}
SELECT DATAQUALITYSEQN ,METADATASEQN ,SCOPE ,REPORT ,LINEAGE FROM WMO_DQ_DATAQUALITY A WHERE A.METADATASEQN= #{metadataseqn}
SELECT SCOPESEQN ,DATAQUALITYSEQN ,LEVELS FROM WMO_DQ_SCOPE A WHERE A.DATAQUALITYSEQN= #{dataqualityseqn}
SELECT LINEAGESEQN ,DATAQUALITYSEQN ,STATEMENT FROM WMO_LI_LINEAGE A WHERE A.DATAQUALITYSEQN= #{dataqualityseqn}
SELECT DOMAINCONSISTENCYSEQN ,DATAQUALITYSEQN ,MEASUREIDENTIFICATION ,RESULT FROM WMO_DQ_DOMAINCONSISTENCY A WHERE A.DATAQUALITYSEQN= #{dataqualityseqn}

SELECT CONFORMANCERESULTSEQN ,DOMAINCONSISTENCYSEQN ,SPECIFICATION ,EXPLANATION ,PASS
FROM WMO_DQ_CONFORMANCERESULT A WHERE A.DOMAINCONSISTENCYSEQN= #{domainconsistencyseqn}
